siteMetadata.title: Eufemia - DNB Design System
siteMetadata.description: Eufemia Design System is the go to place for all who has to design, develop and make digital WEB applications for DNB.

frontmatter.title: Upload
frontmatter.description: The Upload widget should be used in scenarios where the user has to upload files. Files can be uploaded by clicking button. You also have the opportunity to add descriptive texts below the title where you could put max file size, allowed fileformats etc.

frontmatter.title: UI Library
frontmatter.description: Buttons, dropdowns, input fields, components etc.
